4,000 of my closest friends

If you were on the internet in the early days of the web, you probably remember Cat and Girl. You might even be surprised that it's still going.

Here's its author discovering it's been used to train generative AI. And here's an interview she gave to the Markup. Big sighs are about all I have here.
